nodes.text: Gold Seven was the callsign of the second member of Gold Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several beings went by the name Gold Seven.
Gold Seven was the callsign of Keyan Farlander during the Battle of Yavin.
It was later assigned to Lussatte while she was training as a pilot with the New Republic during the campaign against Warlord Zsinj .
